00020 
00023                 template <typename SpecificFaceState>
00024                 static void displayFaceStateFromNet(const SpecificFaceState& face_state, const InetAddress& from)
00025                 {
00026                     if ((_num_received == 0) || (_host_ip != from.getHostIP()))
00027                     {
00028                         _host_ip = from.getHostIP();
00029                         resetCounters();
00030                         std::cout << std::endl << "Receiving FaceState ID " <<
00031                             static_cast<int>(face_state.objectID()) << " data from " << 
00032                             from.getHostIP() << std::endl;
00033                     }
00034                     
00035                     FrameDataInfo display_info = getInfoFromFaceState(face_state);
00036                     processData(display_info);
00037                 }
00038         
00039                 static void displayEngineOutputDataFromNet(EngineOutputData& engine_output_data, const InetAddress& from);
00040

00043                 struct FrameDataInfo
00044                 {
00045                     unsigned long _frame_num;
00046                     bool _tracking;
00047                     unsigned long _num_data_bytes;
00048                 };
00049         
00050                 static FrameDataInfo getInfoFromEngineData(EngineOutputData& output_data);
00051         
00052                 template <typename SpecificFaceState>
00053                 static FrameDataInfo getInfoFromFaceState(const SpecificFaceState& face_state)
00054                 {
00055                     FrameDataInfo retval;
00056                     retval._frame_num = face_state._data.frame_num;
00057                     retval._tracking = face_state._data.is_tracking;
00058                     retval._num_data_bytes = face_state.numDataBytes();
00059         
00060                     return retval;
00061                 }
